bool HumanAgent::resetScenario ( hrc_ros::ResetHumanROSRequest &  req,
hrc_ros::ResetHumanROSResponse &  res 
)
private

Control service to reset human actions/position (task manager calls during the operation).

Parameters
reqResetHumanROS Request object
resResetHumanROS Response object
Returns
True if initialization was successful

Definition at line 53 of file HumanAgent.cpp.

void HumanAgent::update ( )
private

Opens up the websocket server (despotMDPHuman connects to it and provides human action decision and the current state) The socket information is defined under the variables below. Port = 9090

Setting the config port number. Port is configured under HumanAgent.h
